title: 10/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Tom Waddle
itunes:title: 10/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Tom Waddle
description:
Tom Waddle talks to Dan about his playing days in Chicago. Tom says the concussion protocol was if you can count how many fingers your coach was holding up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
